title: Is it possible to get the Twitch Prime loot in New Zealand
body:
same as title basically, is it possible to setup Twitch prime in New Zealand so I can claim the loot? 
From what I've seen it doesn't look like you can.

replies.body:
I need to warn you...

Years ago Hearthstone did a similar thing for free extras ingame, that resulted in a lot of people having to pay year long subscriptions for things they never wanted.
Shit like this gets you paying $200 subscription fees for a $2 ingame bonus.

Just ignore it, the risk isn't worth a token.

I think you can. But you have to get Amazon Prime Video subscription. Until recently in Australia, that was how you could get Prime, but now Australia has "real" Amazon its like normal.

If you go to the sign up page for Twitch Prime, it should tell you. You just select "Other parts of the World" when signing up. There is also a free trial if you haven't used it yet.

https://twitch.amazon.com/prime/country?ref_=sm_om_tpltp&redirectRoute=cHJpbWU=
